website_summaries.verdict: While it would stand out from the competition more if it cost a little less, the Sony H.ear On MDR-100A is a likable over-ear headphone that's comfortable, sounds good, and is attractively designed.
pros: The Sony H.ear On MDR-100A is a stylish-looking over-ear headphone that comes in eye-catching colors and is very comfortable to wear
It delivers pleasant, detailed sound, and folds up into an included protective carrying pouch
cons: Finish can get scratched if dinged, which tarnishes the headphone's attractive look
falls short of being a true "high-fidelity" headphone

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised/Switch compatible/TOO noise-cancelling
customer_reviews.text: I tried them out and within fifteen seconds my roommate was on the floor laughing harder than I've ever seen him laugh. I don't know what he called me or said to me, but suffice it to say, these things are next level as far as being sound-proof/noise-cancelling. Super high sound quality and undistorted bass. I have a similarly-priced pair that is wireless, but was not compatible with the new Ninetendo Switch, so I had to get a wired pair against my will, and let me just say, I didn't want to like them, but sure enough these are the best headphones I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: dove13

customer_reviews.title: No buyers remorse here.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the PlayStation gold headset but opted for this since i could also just use it casually. New to this hires sound stuff but it has made music more enjoyable for me. Super comfortable, Looks great. I've expanded my musical taste with these and couldn't be happier with the purchase. No buyers remorse at all, I use daily and i dont even like listening to headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Kevo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, clear audio, can get LOUD
customer_reviews.text: These sound amazing, i mixed this product with a buetooth reciever but that was too short on the jack, so i use it wired as intended and it soinds great, it can get some good lows that shake your head and highs that would break glass, mids are good, not muddy but not in your face. Fit great, only trade off is they dont “FEEL” premium due to how light they are but that means longer comfort. Can definitely get loud enough for hearing damage or wearing on your neck. Dont even think of comparing beats to these.
customer_reviews.author: David Rosas

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best headphones I have tried! Very comfortable, very high quality make! The way the sound feels gives me goosebumps sometimes. Highly recommend especially if you like music with strong bass like me.
customer_reviews.author: elsa

customer_reviews.title: Great bass without sacrificing clarity
customer_reviews.text: wow i put these one for the first time and i was amazed by its audio quality and how light it is. great and sturdy design, with good bass that doesnt drown out the high or mids.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: fantastic audiophile headphones for public transport at a steal!
customer_reviews.text: it is...okay...at isolating noise. needed a narrow-plug adapter to use my own cable. lightweight and comfortable. wider soundstage than most closed-back headphones. and it's pink!
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Super stylin
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a very big audiophile but I thought these were great! they're gorgeous looking and the sound quality is awesome. They're also very comfortable. I recommend these to my friends when they talk about wanting good (but cute) headphones lol. Most "fashionable" headphones are overpriced and poorly made and most actually-good portable headphones are too bulky for my tastes. This product happily gives you the best of both worlds! Mine look just like the picture. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is excellent, but the material and durability is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is excellent, but the material and durability is terrible. These Stereo Headphones (wired) 1.4 years old.
customer_reviews.author: RYgreg

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SOUND! BEAUTIFUL COLOR!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! AMAZING HEADPHONES! MY MAIN PURPOSE WAS TO USE THESE HEADPHONES FOR AUDIO PURPOSES FOR SCHOOL BUT, AFTER THE FIRST USE NOW I WANNA USE THEM FOR EVERYTHING. MUSIC, FUN, CONVERSATIONS, DROWN OUT SOUNDS, COLOR SO SWEET! SONY A NAME YOU CAN TRUST!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good but very weak connection from cable to headphones
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good but very weak connection from cable to headphones, and since I am a couple days outside the return window (Was a BDay Present), I am unable to replace or return the product. Quite disappointed. CORRECTION: I didn't realize that the headphone connector had tabs that must be aligned properly. My mistake, changed my review from one to four stars.
customer_reviews.author: chrisk

customer_reviews.title: A Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't fit right on my small head. I returned it. It was a beautiful color, I loved it but I don't know anything else about sound etc. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Sony headphones
customer_reviews.text: Used them on two international flights and they were great. Comfortable w glasses, pretty noise cancelling and a really decent price. I like them a lot and sound is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: katej

customer_reviews.title: Over Priced headphones
customer_reviews.text: Sony Put A $200.00 Price Tag On A $50.00 Headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent clarity
customer_reviews.text: These are the best headphones I've ever owned. The sound is mint and music plays crystal clear.
customer_reviews.author: bgaboi

customer_reviews.title: A nice earphone
customer_reviews.text: I have used this earphone for a long time and it was a good earphone when I first bought it. After using it for a long time, I bought another one. However, this is also a good product
customer_reviews.author: SkyReach

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly comfortable (wear close to 6hours straight) + sound is incredible
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for the past week with Deezer Hi-Fi radio and WOW!! Amazingly comfortable (wear close to 6hours straight) + sound is incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I love these headphones. I have studio Sennheisers and a couple other better than average pair, but these are superior. I don't have the knowledge to discuss their technical abilities, but rather, I say that as a long time affectionada of superior music systems and sounds, these are terrific headphones.Whether I'm plugged into my big system or my Walkman NW-A25 (which I bought these for), I can't say enough about these hi-res 'phones. Nice. Very Nice.
customer_reviews.author: MsHarmonyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: very good headphone, the sound quality is very good
customer_reviews.text: very good headphone, the sound quality is very good, as good as the ath m50x.However it is far more comfortable, I can wear this headphone for a long period of time without it hurting my ear like the ath m50 does.
customer_reviews.author: thien nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and build quality
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and build quality. Only negative I would have would be the proprietary cable, even though it looks fairly durable, replacing it would be quite expensive. Otherwise, fairly happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good headphone but a little heavy on my head. Overall, good buy
customer_reviews.author: Thatsnotme

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are great! I like the fit
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great! I like the fit, the sound quality is great and they are comfortable to wear. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Bess

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones! I have a hard time finding over-ear ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headphones! I have a hard time finding over-ear headphones that fit comfortably over my glasses, and I can say these are easily the most comfortable I have ever worn. The headphones look and sound great! The purchase was worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: LE

customer_reviews.title: great quality and arrived in a timely manner
customer_reviews.text: great quality and arrived in a timely manner. i use these about 4 hours a day and they're holding up well so far.
customer_reviews.author: alexandra butler

customer_reviews.title: Very good, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Good enough to buy them in another colour as well! Very balanced sound, clean and maybe not as detailed as the B&W P5's but much more comfortable. Can wear for many hours on end without any discomfort. Only gripe is that the cable does not have volume control, but other than that excellent value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Antpink

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great head phones and the sound quality is excellent when taking a phone call.
customer_reviews.author: Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and build quality. What you'd expect from SONY.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These do sound great, they really do
customer_reviews.text: I have plenty of headphones within the same price range. These do sound great, they really do. Highs and mids are just fantastic and they have a great boomy sony type bass to them. If I were the compare, these are just a tad bit boomier than the ATH M50x's that I have. My biggest gripe with them and why I wouldn't give them the full 5 stars is the build quality. They don't feel premium for the price tag. I just felt that they feel like they are going to break if I make the wrong move. Otherwise, great pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Well-designed and comfortable. Love the color but unfortunately had to return ...
customer_reviews.text: Well-designed and comfortable. Love the color but unfortunately had to return mine within hours of receiving it because the left earpiece had no sound right out of the box. Jiggled the connecting cable and did not help. Disappointed. compared to the other high-end headphones, the sennheinser urbanite has better built quality but the design is not as cool as these Sony headphones, and the beats solo wireless 2 is not as comfortable as these. Overall great headphones but I am not sure it justifies the $200 price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Life Aquatic

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Well, they weren't cheap to buy, and while comfortable and good sounding, the connection is shot after a couple months on the headphone cord and I can now only hear out of the left side if it's all the way in, and the right side if it's half in. No idea why the cord isn't just permanently attached to the headset. No idea if it's the plug or the receptor in the headset. No replacement cords available that I can readily find. So don't bother.
customer_reviews.author: Woodlandnymph73

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great value, pricey cable
customer_reviews.text: Headphone cable is proprietary. Aftermarket cables start at $150. These are now my at-home headphones instead of my on-the-go headphones because I'm THAT scared I'm going to wear out the wire.
customer_reviews.author: J. E. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Too bad. They were very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The headphones didn't work. There was no sound on one side, and the other side cut in and out. Too bad. They were very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: laura hercher

customer_reviews.title: Headphone jack came semi broken, Only the right headphone ...
customer_reviews.text: Headphone jack came semi broken,Only the right headphone emits sound while it's plugged in, wiggling the headset shows left sound still works so i know it's not the headphones, Will remain one star until resolved.
customer_reviews.author: rachel ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Good buy! Worth your money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headphones! Had initially bought the bose soundtrue on the amazon prime day. That turned to be such a disappointment. Bought these after returning Bose. Best decision i have made. Love the clarity of these headphones. Not bass heavy like usual Sony, so perfect for listening to 80's and 90's rock. You wont regret buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Hrsh

customer_reviews.title: Quality build & Sound
customer_reviews.text: Quality build & superior sound. These are the best headphones I've ever owned. I paired them with my Xperia Z4 tablet & Xperia Z3 phone. They feel great & do a great job of blocking outside noise.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: they a realy nice pair of head phones if you dont want the blue tooth version of them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase
customer_reviews.text: The headphones work beautifully. The shipping was fast and greatly packaged. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: This product is great, sound quality is high and it's very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, sound quality is high and it's very comfortable. It's leaks a lot more sound than other reviews have stated and that is disappointing, but other than that it's pretty amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Sony finally figures out how to make great sounding headphones, keep it up guys you are on the right track with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Philip J Scandariato

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great!
customer_reviews.text: They're certainly good headphones for the price. Not as much low-end as I was expecting for "fashion headphones," and not nearly as much mids or highs as I'm used to, but they're definitely not bad. If you're using these with your phone you'll likely love them, and if not, you'll at least not hate them. Very comfortable, great sound, fantastic build (I underestimated how great the silent operation of the hinges/headband was, didn't think that'd ever happen in a modern design like this,) and I'll definitely be recommending them more to friends over other, more popular brands.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Got these headphones at a too good to be true price
customer_reviews.text: Got these headphones at a too good to be true price. Found out the input jack on the headphones is a little too big. Causing the headphone plug-in to not fit snug enough to maintain a connection. the audio would switch from one ear, to both ears, to not all, as the head phone plug was practically falling out of the input hole. No wonder these headphones were on sale for so cheap. Found it a very frustrating experience. Don't buy unless you want defective products. Will never order anything from this place again. I find it hard to believe they didn't know about the defect. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good pair of headphones. Build quality is solid and the sound is excellent for its price.
customer_reviews.author: shenmah

customer_reviews.title: A faulty product that doesn't get the basics working
customer_reviews.text: I returned it as the audio jack(the end that connects to the computer) is faulty and impacts the volume and quality of the sound. It is probably a loose contact. I'm surprised that it is not even a functional set for such a high price. I will not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Sivasubramanian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful looking and still amazing sound! You won't be regret buying this! It's a SONY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chan Xu

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is okay for the price, but they are not very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Froylan Perez Orozco

product_meta.title: Sony hear on Premium Hi-Res Stereo Headphones (wired), Cinnabar Red
product_meta.description: Color:RedThe hear on headphones combine premium Hi-Res Audio quality with striking design and long-listen comfort. Breathtaking sound has never looked so good. Eye-catching forms and surfaces, tactile materials and finishes, premium audio components. The hear on headphones have it all. Cord Length: Approx. 3.94 ft; Frequency Response: 5–60000 Hz; Cord Type: Detachable
feature_bullets: The hear on headphones combine amazing Hi-Res audio quality with an elegant design and one-color finish, Premium components, precision engineered for vibrant sound, Dynamic 40mm HD drivers offer quick response for soaring vocals and mid-high notes.Connectivity Technology: Wired

Titanium-coated diaphragms provide exceptional rigidity for rich, vibrant sound, Beat response control technology delivers deep bass, Draped ear pads offer excellent around-the-ear comfort and prevent sound leakage

Newly developed hinge shape ensures an accurate fit and beautiful design, Silent joints won't disturb your audio experience, In-line multifunction button and microphone for hands-free phone calling, Carrying pouch
5 available colors: Lime Yellow, Viridian Blue, Charcoal Black, Bordeaux Pink, Cinnabar Red

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars229 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
